properties.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Morongo Basin; Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley; Cadiz Basin
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 3:08AM PST until January 29 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California
and southern Nevada.

* WHEN...From 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Strong crosswinds will create hazardous driving conditions and
blowing dust and sand may reduce visibilities to near zero for
brief periods of time. Boaters should use extreme caution when
venturing onto area lakes. Winds will make the lake water over
the open waters rough and hazardous...and may result in high
waves which could tip or swamp smaller craft.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If boating...avoid the
open waters, stay close to shore or in protected areas.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ TO 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY
